Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| V OC |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph:

* HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
* LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)
* V OC (Vocational Open Circuit)

I removed "energy" from the list as it is not a material property, but rather a physical quantity that is used to describe the behavior of materials.
